2073760.name: Rush Hour Deluxe
2073760.description:
Can you skilfully manoeuvre the red car out of the traffic jam?

Slide the vehicles blocking it in their lanes forwards and backwards – until the road ahead is clear for the red car!

Not only can you play Rush Hour® Deluxe alone, but go head-to-head with other players to measure your brainpower: who will solve the challenges in the quickest time and with the fewest moves?

  • With the original design of the successful board game
  • Playful logical brain training
  • 60 challenges
  • 5 difficulty levels
  • Play alone or locally with up to 4 players (requires up to 3 additional game controllers)
  • Great animations and effects
2073760.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 俄语
